content:
Prev: Ashford Mill, I Up: Death Valley Next: Ashford Mill, III

Ashford Mill, II



Looking back down the valley at some unexpected stormy weather on the Panamints. It drizzled a little on us south of Badwater as we drove out, but we hit much worse weather later on the Cajon Pass.
Taken Thursday, April 01, 2004, 01:16:51pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 7.2Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/60s @ F16.0, ISO 100, 28mm/F2.8 (45mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5600:-10, 0.85:18:0:65:3:25:0, Curves 0:0 - 100:100 - 120:125 - 175:175 - 195:210 - 215:230 - 255:255
